Informational tweet;  Reminder regarding spread. As we see the lowsat coins jump around -> buy them through $BNB / $USDT or $ETH pair.   Why?  For example $DENT from 4-5 sats is 25% spread to buy + a wall.  In $ETH it's 278-279, which is <1%.   Goes for; $NPXS / $BTT / $HOT etc.
